EmailTemplate.name: MBO Enterprise 2011
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Holidays
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for offering us the opportunity to work with you throughout the year. We would like to wish you a joyous and memorable holiday season, with the hopes that the coming New Year continues to bring you happiness and success.
To view your e-card please click on the link below, or enter it into your browser. http://www.customecards.net/mbo_partners/
Warmest Holiday Regards,
MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171 www.mbopartners.com
